abilities.name: She is fearless
abilities.description: Each character in this Unit may [[jump]] This Unit may use this ability two times during its activation instead of the normal one.

abilities.name: Riposte
abilities.description: After a attacking targeting a character in this Unit is resolved, this Unit may use this ability. If the attack roll contains one or more results, the attacking Unit suffers .

abilities.name: Then I will avenge his death
abilities.description: After this Unit makes a combat action, it may use this ability. One character in this Unit may make an attack targeting one of the same enemy characters within range and LOS.

abilities.name: I am no Jedi
abilities.description: Once per Turn, when a character in this Unit Wounds an enemy Unit, after the effect is resolved, refresh and one character in this Unit may . Then if the enemy Unit was a Primary Unit or Secondary Unit you may refresh or one character in this Unit may make a 5 dice attack.
